all.Title: All

github-copilot.Description: Master GitHub Copilot, your AI coding companion. Discover features, tips, and real-world insights to supercharge your development workflow.

news.Description: GitHub Copilot news from their official product updates.

blogs.Description: A collection of blogs that are worth your while.

vscode-updates.Description: Fokko Veegens showing you all the latest features of each Visual Studio Code release.

levels-of-enlightenment.Description: Rob Bos's comprehensive guide to mastering GitHub Copilot through progressive learning stages.

handbook.Title: The GitHub Copilot Handbook
handbook.Description: A practical guide by Rob Bos and Randy Pagels to transforming the software development lifecycle with GitHub Copilot.
